subject.normal: To dynamicaly update colour on SVG file

headers.subject: RE: To dynamicaly update colour on SVG file

body.para: If you have access to the SVGDocument object you can set the new color in the dom and re-render it. OR there is something as dynamic property you can make use of it.

quote.quotepara: -----Original Message----- From: Arvind Sareen [mailto:arvind_sareen@hotmail.com] Sent: Friday, July 12, 2002 12:34 PM To: batik-users@xml.apache.org Subject: To dynamicaly update colour on SVG file
I need to dynamically update the colour of the line displayed in the SVG file(i.e. once an SVG file is displayed , I need to change the colour of the
line depending upon the user input) Can anybody provide a workaround or solution to the above problem.
